name: ENVIRONMENT, HEALTH AND MALNUTRITION RESEARCH FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Environment, Health and Malnutrition Research (EHMR) Foundation is a no profit research based organization committed to strengthening, reviving or restoring, where necessary, the process for clean environment, good health and to remove malnutrition from the country. EHMR Foundation main activities include Environmental & Health Education and Awareness campaigns and to carry out innovative research in these areas for a better life for all.Bring the change in society through innovation!
